Item.TextToWrite: Hey! Welcome to Town! # My name is Julian, I run the workshop.# I'd love some help if you're up for it. My blueprint table has a list of prototypes which I still need materials for to research. # Once you've filled in the materials for a particular invention let me know and I'll start working on it right away! `
Item.SelectableOptions: Shop~OpenJulianShop,Great!~ExitDialogue, Where can I find materials?~Load.11

Item.TextToWrite: Nearly all the materials I need can be found in the wilderness, some of the materials may require a fair bit of exploring to find, however. `
Have you by chance seen a big metal gear? Can't seem to remember what I did with it.
carry the two... eighteen? No wait... thirty two? That doesn't seem right either.
Oh hey! I managed to prototype your latest invention. # Here are my notes...# You'll now be able to create it on your own! `
Item.SelectableOptions: Shop~OpenJulianShop,Great!~ExitDialogue, Where can I find materials?~Load.11
